mapper.select: select * from tb_meal where user_id = #{userId} and r_date > sysdate-1

select b.board_no, b.board_title, b.create_date, f.board_no free, m.board_no market, c.board_no club, cn.board_no club_notice from tb_board b LEFT JOIN tb_free f ON(b.board_no = f.board_no) LEFT JOIN tb_market m ON(b.board_no = m.board_no) LEFT JOIN tb_club c ON(b.board_no = c.board_no) LEFT JOIN tb_club_notice cn ON(b.board_no = cn.board_no) where b.user_id = #{userId} and board_delete = 'N'

select c.reply_no, c.board_no, c.notice_no, c.vote_id, c.reply_content, c.comment_date, CASE WHEN f.board_no != null THEN '자유' WHEN m.board_no != null THEN '중고장터' WHEN cl.board_no != null THEN '동호회' WHEN cn.board_no != null THEN '동호회 공지' WHEN nc.notice_no != null THEN '공지' WHEN v.vote_id != null THEN '투표' END as type from tb_comment c LEFT JOIN tb_free f ON(c.board_no = f.board_no) LEFT JOIN tb_market m ON(c.board_no = m.board_no) LEFT JOIN tb_club cl ON(c.board_no = cl.board_no) LEFT JOIN tb_club_notice cn ON(c.board_no = cn.board_no) LEFT JOIN tb_notice nc ON(c.notice_no = nc.notice_no) LEFT JOIN tb_vote v ON(c.vote_id = v.vote_id) where c.user_id = #{userId} and c.comments_delete = 'N'
mapper.insert: insert into tb_qna values(SEQ_QNA.NEXTVAL, #{QNATitle}, #{QNAContent}, #{userId}, default, default)

insert all into tb_qna values(SEQ_QNA.NEXTVAL, #{QNATitle}, #{QNAContent}, #{userId}, default, default) into tb_file values(SEQ_FILE.NEXTVAL, null, #{QNAFileName}, null, SEQ_QNA.CURRVAL) select * from dual
mapper.select: select count(*) from tb_QnA where user_id = #{userId}
